message:
So, Holden Web ran DjangoCon US 2010 and people seemed to enjoy it. The 2011 conference will also be held in Portland.

Holden Web's new subsidiary (theopenbastion.com) wants to both bring open source tech conferences to Portland and take similar events to the regions that need them.
So, you urgently need to meet with practitioners in which emerging open source technologies, exactly?
And, of course, where. What's a suitable tool to discover your product's geospatial demographic?
